title: Jiyva mutations
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

For most species, these mutations can only be acquired as gifts while worshiping [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva").

## Contents

- [1 Offensive](#Offensive)

  - [1.1 Acidic Bite](#Acidic_Bite)
  - [1.2 Eyeballs](#Eyeballs)
  - [1.3 Pseudopods](#Pseudopods)
  - [1.4 Engulf](#Engulf)

- [2 Defensive](#Defensive)

  - [2.1 Gelatinous Body](#Gelatinous_Body)
  - [2.2 Jelly Missile](#Jelly_Missile)
  - [2.3 Translucent Skin](#Translucent_Skin)
  - [2.4 Tendrils](#Tendrils)

- [3 General](#General)
  - [3.1 Jelly Sensing Items](#Jelly_Sensing_Items)

- [4 History](#History)

## Offensive

### Acidic Bite

|                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                           |                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                            | Effect                                                                                    | Flavor                  |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                               | [Auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") bite attack with [corrosion](/Corrosion "Corrosion"). | You have acidic saliva. |
| **Damage:** `5` plus `2d4` acid, may corrode target **Chance**: `40% * (30 + XL)/59` per melee attack If you have [Fangs](/Fangs "Fangs"), add 4 base + 2d4 acid damage to Fangs' bite instead. |                                                                                           |                         |
| **Species notes:** Yellow Draconians gain this mutation at XL14.                                                                                                                                |                                                                                           |                         |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation")                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                           |                         |

### Eyeballs

|                                                    |                                                                                                                                                             |                                                            |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                               | Effect                                                                                                                                                      | Flavor                                                     |
| 1                                                  | +3 to hit. Chance to cause [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion") in foes who attack you in melee.                                                             | Your body has grown eyes which may confuse attackers.      |
| 2                                                  | +5 to hit. Higher chance to cause [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion") in foes who attack you in melee.                                                      | Your body has grown many eyes which may confuse attackers. |
| 3                                                  | +7 to hit and [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"). Highest chance to cause [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion") in foes who attack you in melee. | Your body is covered in eyes which may confuse attackers.  |
| Chance is 5%, 10%, or 15%. Checks will.            |                                                                                                                                                             |                                                            |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation") |                                                                                                                                                             |                                                            |

### Pseudopods

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                                       |                                                |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Effect                                                                                                | Flavor                                         |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [Auxiliary](/Auxiliary "Auxiliary") pseudopod attack. Reduces body armour base [AC](/AC "AC") by 50%. | Armour fits poorly on your pseudopods.         |
| 2                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Stronger pseudopod attack.                                                                            | Armour fits poorly on your large pseudopods.   |
| 3                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | Even stronger pseudopod attack.                                                                       | Armour fits poorly on your massive pseudopods. |
| **Damage:** `(4 * rank)` **Chance**: `66% * (30 + XL)/59` per melee attack The Pseudopods AC penalty functions identically to the [Deformed](/Deformed "Deformed") mutation. If you have both, only one AC penalty is applied. |                                                                                                       |                                                |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation")                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                       |                                                |

### Engulf

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                        |                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| Rank                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Effect                                                                 | Flavor                                           |
| 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 50% chance of [engulfing](/Engulf "Engulf") monsters on melee attacks. | Your melee attacks may engulf your foes in ooze. |
| Only monsters of the same [size](/Size "Size") or smaller can be engulfed, and constriction immune monsters are immune. Engulfed monsters are [silenced](/Silence "Silence") and take asphyxiation damage (if vulnerable). Also extinguishes [sticky flame](/Sticky_flame "Sticky flame"). |                                                                        |                                                  |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                                                                        |                                                  |

## Defensive

### Gelatinous Body

|                                                                       |              |                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                  | Effect       | Flavor                                 |
| 1                                                                     | +1 AC, +1 EV | Your rubbery body absorbs attacks.     |
| 2                                                                     | +2 AC, +2 EV | Your pliable body absorbs attacks.     |
| 3                                                                     | +3 AC, +3 EV | Your gelatinous body deflects attacks. |
| **Species notes:** [Octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") start at rank 1. |              |                                        |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation")                    |              |                                        |

### Jelly Missile

|                                                    |                                                                                                                                                  |                                                                     |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                               | Effect                                                                                                                                           | Flavor                                                              |
| 1                                                  | Each time you are injured by a [jelly](/Jelly "Jelly")-edible projectile, there is a 67% chance that you will be healed for 1d(damage received). | You have a small jelly attached to you that may absorb projectiles. |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation") |                                                                                                                                                  |                                                                     |

### Translucent Skin

|                                                                                    |                                                  |                                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                                                               | Effect                                           | Flavor                                                           |
| 1                                                                                  | Stealth +50. Slightly reduced enemy accuracy     | Your translucent skin slightly reduces your foes' accuracy.      |
| 2                                                                                  | Stealth +50. More greatly reduced enemy accuracy | Your translucent skin reduces your foes' accuracy.               |
| 3                                                                                  | Stealth +50. Most greatly reduced enemy accuracy | Your transparent skin significantly reduces your foes' accuracy. |
| Accuracy reduction is 2\*mutation level. Has no effect if the enemy can't see you. |                                                  |                                                                  |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation")                                 |                                                  |                                                                  |

### Tendrils

|                                                    |                                                                                      |                                                                   |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                               | Effect                                                                               | Flavor                                                            |
| 1                                                  | 20% chance of passively attempting to disarm opponents who strike you with a weapon. | You are covered in slimy tendrils that may disarm your opponents. |
| Monsters have an HD/35 chance to resist.           |                                                                                      |                                                                   |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation") |                                                                                      |                                                                   |

## General

### Jelly Sensing Items

|                                                    |                           |                                                                  |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Rank                                               | Effect                    | Flavor                                                           |
| 1                                                  | Detect items in radius 5. | You have a small jelly attached to you that senses nearby items. |
| [Jiyva mutation](/Jiyva_mutation "Jiyva mutation") |                           |                                                                  |

## History

- [0.27](/0.27 "0.27") - Engulf added.
- [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") - Tendrils, Jelly Growth, and Jelly Missile added. [Jelly Spawner](/Jelly_Spawner "Jelly Spawner") removed.
html:
Jiyva mutations

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For most species, these mutations can only be acquired as gifts while worshiping Jiyva.

Contents

  • 1 Offensive
    • 1.1 Acidic Bite
    • 1.2 Eyeballs
    • 1.3 Pseudopods
    • 1.4 Engulf
  • 2 Defensive
    • 2.1 Gelatinous Body
    • 2.2 Jelly Missile
    • 2.3 Translucent Skin
    • 2.4 Tendrils
  • 3 General
    • 3.1 Jelly Sensing Items
  • 4 History

Offensive

Acidic Bite

Rank Effect Flavor
1 Auxiliary bite attack with corrosion. You have acidic saliva.

Damage: 5 plus 2d4 acid, may corrode target
Chance: 40% * (30 + XL)/59 per melee attack
If you have Fangs, add 4 base + 2d4 acid damage to Fangs' bite instead.

Species notes: Yellow Draconians gain this mutation at XL14.

Jiyva mutation


Eyeballs

Rank Effect Flavor
1 +3 to hit. Chance to cause confusion in foes who attack you in melee. Your body has grown eyes which may confuse attackers.
2 +5 to hit. Higher chance to cause confusion in foes who attack you in melee. Your body has grown many eyes which may confuse attackers.
3 +7 to hit and see invisible. Highest chance to cause confusion in foes who attack you in melee. Your body is covered in eyes which may confuse attackers.

Chance is 5%, 10%, or 15%. Checks will.

Jiyva mutation


Pseudopods

Rank Effect Flavor
1 Auxiliary pseudopod attack.
Reduces body armour base AC by 50%.		 Armour fits poorly on your pseudopods.
2 Stronger pseudopod attack. Armour fits poorly on your large pseudopods.
3 Even stronger pseudopod attack. Armour fits poorly on your massive pseudopods.

Damage: (4 * rank)
Chance: 66% * (30 + XL)/59 per melee attack
The Pseudopods AC penalty functions identically to the Deformed mutation.
If you have both, only one AC penalty is applied.

Jiyva mutation


Engulf

Rank Effect Flavor
1 50% chance of engulfing monsters on melee attacks. Your melee attacks may engulf your foes in ooze.

Only monsters of the same size or smaller can be engulfed, and constriction immune monsters are immune.
Engulfed monsters are silenced and take asphyxiation damage (if vulnerable).
Also extinguishes sticky flame.

Jiyva mutation

Defensive

Gelatinous Body

Rank Effect Flavor
1 +1 AC, +1 EV Your rubbery body absorbs attacks.
2 +2 AC, +2 EV Your pliable body absorbs attacks.
3 +3 AC, +3 EV Your gelatinous body deflects attacks.

Species notes: Octopodes start at rank 1.

Jiyva mutation


Jelly Missile

Rank Effect Flavor
1 Each time you are injured by a jelly-edible projectile, there is a 67% chance that you will be healed for 1d(damage received). You have a small jelly attached to you that may absorb projectiles.

Jiyva mutation


Translucent Skin

Rank Effect Flavor
1 Stealth +50. Slightly reduced enemy accuracy Your translucent skin slightly reduces your foes' accuracy.
2 Stealth +50. More greatly reduced enemy accuracy Your translucent skin reduces your foes' accuracy.
3 Stealth +50. Most greatly reduced enemy accuracy Your transparent skin significantly reduces your foes' accuracy.

Accuracy reduction is 2*mutation level. Has no effect if the enemy can't see you.

Jiyva mutation


Tendrils

Rank Effect Flavor
1 20% chance of passively attempting to disarm opponents who strike you with a weapon. You are covered in slimy tendrils that may disarm your opponents.

Monsters have an HD/35 chance to resist.

Jiyva mutation


General

Jelly Sensing Items

Rank Effect Flavor
1 Detect items in radius 5. You have a small jelly attached to you that senses nearby items.

Jiyva mutation


History

  • 0.27 - Engulf added.
  • 0.13 - Tendrils, Jelly Growth, and Jelly Missile added. Jelly Spawner removed.
